vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
Centra4.transfer (patch_19.sol#8-21) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(c2,k) (patch_19.sol#18)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_19.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (patch_19.sol#1): it allows old versions
